---
title: Prone Press-Up Exercise
---


# P-A Mobilization

Cody prone press-up With P-A
Keep your weight above the patient where your arms are pointing in a P-A Direction
Apply pressure as inferiorly as possible (as close to L5-S1)
It is difficult to apply pressure on S1 due to the innominates
Your goal is to prevent their hips from coming off of the table
Peripheralization of pain down the leg is bad and indicates that you should stop
